---
title: Select
---
# Select

<div class="used-tiny">

The user can select one or more options from multiple options.&nbsp;&nbsp;

+ it supports single select, multiple select, group select, search, and lazy loading.

```typescript
import { TiSelectModule } from '@opentiny/ng';
```

</div>
